participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves social activities and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I own a cat and a dog. I'm a party animal. I am deathly afraid of heights.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Friendly and easy-going, enjoys sharing experiences and making connections.
participant_2.background: My parents were also teachers. I'm an elementary school teacher. I love to play board games. My favorite band is Up and I got to see them in concert once. For vacation, I enjoy time at the beach.

content.text:
Hey! What's up? üòÖ.
Some facts about me: i'm a party animal
hi there. i'm an elementary school teacher. do you have a job?
i am a manager at a sporting goods store i love to hunt
my parents were also teachers. Are your parents also managers?
i bet you made a lot of friends
sure I did. i love to play board games and it's very popular! What do you do for fun?
i do that too . i also enjoy suspense novels . üòç
my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. do you want to come with me?
cool i've a big binder with 3 rings an ponies all on it. Also, try to guess: my favorite movie ...
for vacation i enjoy time at the beach where is alot of girls. do you want to be my girl?
i still live at home so i do not have the money for any vacations . what do you like to do ?
